MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas, affecting properties in Oldcastle Lane, Wrexham Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  2:55PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:58PM on 19th February 2021.
